Articles.Content: Yup, it's me again. When placing wings on an aircraft, for example delta wings, do i put one on each side, or can i make longer wings to add more lift? Because no matter how i design my aircraft, they always pitch forwards in flight.
If your planes are pitching foward it means the centre of lift is behind the centre of mass. You could put your wings futher foward or move heavy stuff futher back.

Just keep moving the winds slightly forward or backwards until it feels more balanced.

I believe in 0.17 there's going to be a feature to help see the centre of gravity. Correct me if im wrong.

Centre of Mass (not gravity). As well as centre of Lift, centre of Thrust and center of Drag.

I'm hoping for centre of mass for Full and Dry.
